articles.title: ChatGPT-maker warns it might leave EU over planned AI law - BBC
articles.description: OpenAI's Sam Altman says if it fails to comply with the forthcoming AI Act, it might exit the EU.
articles.content:
The boss of the company behind ChatGPT has said it might consider leaving the EU if it fails to comply with a planned law on artificial intelligence (AI).
The EU's planned legislation could be the f… [+2805 chars]

articles.title: Solar investment outshines oil as race for clean energy heats up - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: High oil and gas prices and worries about supplies have seen spending on renewables leap ahead of fossil fuels.
articles.content:
Investment in solar power is expected to overtake oil for the first time this year as clean energy spending outpaces that for fossil fuels.

articles.title: British Pound Shrugs Off Blistering CPI: What's Next for GBP/USD, EUR/GBP, GBP/JPY? - DailyFX
articles.description: The British pound’s rally against some of its peers has stalled recently, and chances are that the consolidation could extend a bit further in the short term. What is the outlook for GBP/USD, GBP/JPY, and EUR/GBP?
